# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)

project(SunRiZeModel)

# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_PATH "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/SunRiZeModel")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
set(wxWidgets_CONFIGURATION mswu)
find_package(wxWidgets COMPONENTS core base REQUIRED)
include(${wxWidgets_USE_FILE})
find_package(PythonInterp) 
find_package(PythonLibs) 
#}}}}

include_directories( . )


# Compiler options
execute_process(COMMAND 
    wx-config --cxxflags --debug=no --unicode=yes
    OUTPUT_VARIABLE
    CL_TMP_VAR
    OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE)
string(STRIP ${CL_TMP_VAR} CL_VAR_1)
execute_process(COMMAND 
    wx-config --cxxflags --debug=no --unicode=yes
    OUTPUT_VARIABLE
    CL_TMP_VAR
    OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE)
string(STRIP ${CL_TMP_VAR} CL_VAR_2)
add_definitions(${CL_VAR_1})
add_definitions(${CL_VAR_2})
add_definitions(-O3)
add_definitions(-std=c++11)
add_definitions(-fPIC)
add_definitions(
    -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64
    -DWXUSINGDLL
    -D__WXGTK__
)


# Linker options
execute_process(COMMAND 
    wx-config --debug=no --libs --unicode=yes
    OUTPUT_VARIABLE
    CL_TMP_VAR
    OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE)
string(STRIP ${CL_TMP_VAR} CL_VAR_3)
set(LINK_OPTIONS ${CL_VAR_3})
set(LINK_OPTIONS ${LINK_OPTIONS} -s)


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
set(CMAKE_LDFLAGS "${CMAKE_LDFLAGS} -L. ")

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/Factory.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/STransition.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/TransitionDialog.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/TransitionDialogImplementation.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/SState.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/StateDialog.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/StateDialogImplementation.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/ModuleDialog.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/ModuleDialogImplementation.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/SModule.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/SInitState.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/SDependency.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/SCondition.cpp
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -O3 -std=c++11 -pthread -fPIC")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_library(SunRiZeModel SHARED ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(SunRiZeModel ${LINK_OPTIONS})
target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} ${wxWidgets_LIBRARIES})

#{{{{ User Code 3
# Place your code here
#}}}}
